data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Reserve with Google Integration. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Strategic Availability Hiding ("Look Busy"). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Multi-Provider Appointment with Commission Split. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The QR Code Check-In/Booking. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
